entries.m_greet: I'm in some trouble here. Someone told the Imperials that I'm some sort of rebel spy. I ain't no rebel. I'm just a farmer. I scared they are going to take away my land and throw me in prison. Can you help protect me if they try?
entries.a_greet: Who are you? You're standing in the way of Imperial business. Are you going to stand aside?
entries.m_yes: I sure do appreciate that. I'm guessing they will be here any time now.
entries.m_no: Well, I guess I shouldn't have expected any help. You'd have likely been labeled a rebel too. Oh well.
entries.m_thank_combat: Well, that's that for now, but something tells me this is just the start of my problems. I think it is time for me to start looking for a way off this planet.
entries.a_greet_rebel: Stand aside, unless you want to be arrested too.
entries.a_greet_imperial: We've have this situation under control. Please stand aside.
entries.m_maybe: I ain't no good at talking my way out of nothing. When they get here, maybe you can see if they'll change their mind about me.
entries.a_no: You are in direct violation of an Imperial order and are under arrest.
entries.a_maybe: Just a farmer? Then what was he doing tampering with an Imperial relay tower?
entries.m_will_negotiate: Tampering? I wasn't tampering. It was buzzing for three days. Scaring my livestock. I just figured I could fix it so it stopped making so much noise. I wasn't spying or nothing.
entries.m_no_negotiate: Well, thanks for trying. I just can't let them take my land. I ain't no rebel, but maybe it's my calling after all.
entries.a_decline_offer: It is illegal to tamper with Imperial property. He's just admitted his guilt.
entries.a_accept_offer: Well, the relay tower was having some problems and it isn't now. All right, we'll let him go.
entries.response_negotiate: Wait. This may be a mistake. This is just a simple farmer, not a rebel spy.
entries.m_thank_negotiate: You pretty much saved my life there. Thank you so much!
entries.m_waiting: Yep, they're coming now. Oh, I got a bad feeling coming on.
entries.a_greet_m: Halt! Come with us peacefully. You are wanted for questioning.
entries.m_greet_a: I ain't no rebel spy. I don't know who told you that, but it just ain't true!
entries.a_respond_m_1: We have a warrant for your arrest. Come with us.
entries.a_thank_combat: That takes care of this situation.
entries.a_thank_negotiate: Thank you for your assistance in this matter.
entries.minion_2: We're rounding up suspected rebel spies.
entries.minion_3: They always say they are just innocent farmers.
entries.minion_4: We have undisputable evidence that he tampered with Imperial property.
entries.minion_5: He looks like a rebel to me.
entries.a_greet_mad: Halt! Come with us for questioning now or we'll shoot.
entries.a_waiting: Come with us now. We have orders to blast those who resist.
entries.a_negotiate_fail: It doesn't matter what his reason was. The activity was still illegal.
entries.a_thank_negotiate_again: The situation is clear. Heading back to base.
entries.a_tired_waiting: You have been warned. Take him down!
entries.m_saved: I think this is a sure sign that I should join the rebellion.
entries.m_betrayed: I'm just a farmer! You are as bad as they are.
entries.m_sorry: I'm just a farmer. I'm innocent.
